definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about traffic related logs.
- Traffic logs displays source and destination zones, addresses, and ports; security rule applied to the traffic flow; rule action (allow, deny, or drop); number of bytes; session end reason; etc.

## Widgets
2. Total Traffic Events
3. Traffic Events Overtime
5. Bytes Activity Overtime
6. Packets Activity Overtime
7. Top Source Users
8. Top Destination Users
9. Top Sources
10. Top Destinations
11. Application vs Technology Breakdown
12. Traffic by Application
13. Source Zone Distribution
14. Destination Zone Distribution
15. Action Distribution
16. Top Reasons for Session End
17. Top Rules
18. Top Flags
19. Top Policies
20. Tunnel Type Distribution 
21. Protocol Distribution
22. App details with Risk
23. Log Details
